title: What should we do with BIG DATA?
text:
Data-driven discovery ‚Ä¶ or ‚Äúdata science‚Äù



‚ÄúJim Gray unveiled a vision of the fourth-paradigm‚Ä¶ scientific methodology has evolved into three distinct archetypes: empiricism, theory, and computation. The Fourth Paradigm is an entirely new phase that involves data-intensive practices. Termed ‚ÄúeScience,‚Äù this fourth paradigm unites theory, experimentation, and computation‚Äù



January 11, 2007, National Research Council






Jim Gray






What can we ask with data science?
